text: in 2012 Valentine Gruner rescued a young
lion Kevin raised it himself at a
wildlife park in Botswana it was the
start the most extraordinary
relationship but and this is what
happens every morning when he goes to
see her these are great great pictures
because look at that well the line is
called serger and she was rescued from a
holding pen established by a farmer who
was fed up with shooting animals that
preyed on his cattle and Valentin has
devoted his life to her and she
certainly seems to appreciate it because
he has become well adopted mother they
spend their time hanging out in the
Botswana Bush doing kind of things that
cats enjoy not only that but lying
around
absolutely fantastic pictures
